title: Pot purri
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Colin Low, Vic Jobin, Jeffrey Hale, Derek Lamb, Kaj Pindal, Grant Munro, Cameron Guers and Rhoda Leyer
brief_description: A selection of publicity clips mounted together in one film to show techniques of NFB animators. As in ‘Hors d’oeuvre’, these films were produced originally for Government Agencies, to carry a message to the public about fire, water, traffic safety and mailing early for Christmas. Punctuated with adroit sound effects, each clip drives home its message humorously and succinctly.
